metadata.dcterms:title: Pilot Study of Pediatric Integrative Medicine in Pediatric Oncology, General Pediatrics and Pediatric Cardiology
metadata.dcterms:creator: Vohra, Sunita
metadata.dcterms:description: This study will investigate if adding complementary therapies such as acupuncture, massage and reiki to inpatient pediatric care is feasible and what the effects are on outcomes such as patient symptoms, cost, safety, satisfaction and length of stay.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
complementary medicine
pediatrics
alternative medicine
